overview: A Jewish girl and an SS officer are protagonists of the computer game developed by the young game designer Yaar. The story is said to be based on the experiences of his grandmother in the Krakow ghetto. What begins as a journey into the past quickly becomes a search for one's own identity. FINALLY TACHELES is an intensive examination of the consequences of National Socialism and shows people on their very personal way of dealing with history.
title: Endlich Tacheles
